document.docAuthor: Pohl, Greg, Anweiler, Gary, Schmidt, Christian & Kondla, Norbert
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated list of the Lepidoptera of Alberta, Canada

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated list of the Lepidoptera of Alberta, Canada

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Northern Forestry Centre, Natural Resources Canada, Edmonton ,, Canada
University of Alberta Strickland Entomology Museum ,, Canada
Canadian Food Inspection Agency, Ottawa, Canada

subSubSection.paragraph:
1142 * R
Cupido amyntula (Boisduval, 1852) ssp. albrighti E Jun
– M Jul M B G (Clench, 1944)
Western Tailed Blue
T: Kudrna (1986) , Warren (2005)
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , [ Guppy
and Shepard (2001)] C: CNC, NFRC, OLDS,
PMAE, UASM

1143 * R
Celastrina lucia (Kirby, 1837)
May M B g Boreal Azure
T: Pavulaan and Wright (2005)
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: CNC, NFRC, OLDS,
PMAE, UASM

1144 * R
Celastrina echo (Edwards, 1864) ssp. nigrescens
L May – M Jun M – – (Fletcher, 1903)
Western Azure
L: [ Bird et al. (1995) ], Layberry et al. (1998) C:
CNC, PMAE, UASM

1145 * R
Celastrina neglecta (Edwards, 1862) ssp. argentata Jul
– b g (Fletcher, 1903)
Summer Azure
L: None C: G. J. Hilchie collection, NGKC

1146 * R
Euphilotes ancilla (Barnes and McDunnough, 1918) Jun
– – G Ancilla Blue
T: Pratt (1994) , Pratt and Emmel (1998) , Warren (2005)
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: UASM

1147 * R
Glaucopsyche piasus (Boisduval, 1852) ssp. daunia Jun
m b G (Edwards, 1871)
Arrowhead Blue
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , [ Guppy
and Shepard (2001)] C: CNC, PMAE, UASM

1148 * R
Glaucopsyche lygdamus (Doubleday, 1841) ssp. afra
M May – M Jul M B G (Edwards, [1884])
Silvery Blue
OLDS, PMAE, UASM

1149a * R
Plebejus idas (Linnaeus, 1761) ssp. scudderii Jul M B
– (Edwards, 1861)
Scudder’s Blue
T: Balint and Johnson (1997) , Nice et al. (2002 ,
L: [ Bird et al. (1995) ], Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: CNC, PMAE, UASM

1149b * R
Plebejus idas (Linnaeus, 1761) ssp. atrapraetextus Jul M
– –
Field, 1939
Dark-edged Blue
T: Balint and Johnson (1997) , Scott et al. (2006)
L: Guppy and Shepard (2001) C: CNC, PMAE, UASM

1150 * R
Plebejus melissa (Edwards, 1873)
May; Jul; Aug m b G Melissa Blue (3Br?)
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: CNC, NFRC, OLDS,
PMAE, UASM

1151 * R
Aricia saepiolus (Boisduval, 1852) ssp. amica M Jun
– M Jul M B G
(Edwards, 1863)

L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: CNC, NFRC, OLDS,
PMAE, UASM

1152 * R

1153 R

1154 * R

– M Jul M – G Lupine Blue

UASM

1155 * R H
Albulina optilete (Knoch, 1781) Jul
– B – Cranberry Blue

L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: NFRC, PMAE, UASM

1156a * R
Agriades glandon (de Prunner, 1798) ssp. lacustris Jun
– B –
(Freeman, 1939)
Boreal Blue
Guppy and Shepard (2001) C: UASM

1156b * R
Agriades glandon (de Prunner, 1798) ssp. megalo Jul M
